levels.title: The Sealed Chamber
levels.story: You find yourself in a dimly lit chamber with stone walls. A large door blocks your way, and an inscription above reads: 'I speak without a mouth and hear without ears. I have no body, but I come alive with the wind.'
levels.hint: Hint: Something you can hear but cannot see...

levels.title: The Ancient Vault
levels.story: Beyond the chamber, you enter a vast hall filled with ancient relics. A pedestal in the center holds a locked box, and a riddle is etched onto its surface: 'The more of me you take, the more you leave behind.'
levels.hint: Hint: Something left behind as you move...

levels.title: The Final Barrier
levels.story: Inside the vault, a golden door stands before you, with one final challenge inscribed: 'I can be cracked, made, told, and played. What am I?'
levels.hint: Hint: Something humorous, but also something that can be deciphered...

success.title: Escape Complete!
success.message: Congratulations! You have solved all the riddles and escaped the mysterious ruins. The knowledge you have gained will serve you well in the adventures to come...
